Submodules

rigel.models.application module

class rigel.models.application.Application(*, distro: str, jobs: Dict[str, PluginDataModel], dir: str = '.')[source]

Bases: BaseModel

A placeholder for information regarding a single ROS application. Each ROS application contains at least one ROS package.

Each ROS application may support the execution of individual jobs.

Variables:

  • distro – Target ROS distro.

  • dir – The folder containing the ROS package source code, if any. Defaults to ‘.’.

  • jobs – The jobs supported by the package.

dir: str
distro: str
jobs: Dict[str, PluginDataModel]

rigel.models.builder module

class rigel.models.builder.ModelBuilder(instance_type: Type)[source]

Bases: object

A class to help instantiate model classes. This class handles all the exceptions that may occur while creating instances of a given class.

build(args: List[Any], kwargs: Dict[str, Any]) → Any[source]

Create an instance of the specified class.

Parameters:

  • args (List[Any]) – List of required class arguments.

  • kwargs (Dict[str, Any]) – Positional class arguments.

Return type:

Type

Returns:

An instance of the specified class.

rigel.models.rigelfile module

class rigel.models.rigelfile.Rigelfile(*, applications: Dict[str, Application], providers: Dict[str, ProviderDataModel] = {}, sequences: Dict[str, List[str]] = {}, vars: Dict[str, ComplexDataModel | bool | float | int | str] = {})[source]

Bases: BaseModel

A placeholder for information regarding a set of ROS packages.

Each set may contain multiple ROS packages supporting the execution of individual jobs and job sequences.

Variables:

  • applications – The set of relevant ROS applications.

  • sequences – The supported sequence of jobs.

  • providers – A list of required providers.

  • vars – Section containing the values of global variables.

applications: Dict[str, Application]
providers: Dict[str, ProviderDataModel]
sequences: Dict[str, List[str]]
vars: Dict[str, ComplexDataModel | bool | float | int | str]
